column1: I don't care if companies use my data to sell me ice cream when I'm on a diet. I do worry about the government or bad actors using personal data for nefarious purposes. It's important we hear about solutions that don't disrupt innovation investment or growth.  #CongressatCULaw

Today I've been able to celebrate the life of a great friend and the birth of my third grandchild.  These are the kind of life events Americans across the country cherish not the hyperpartisan impeachment proceedings in Washington.  And we're better off for it.

With Democrats fixated on impeaching the president issues like border security and spending control have been overshadowed.   Let’s leave impeachment in 2019 and get back to the job we were sent to Washington to do.

Instead of allowing the Senate to get to work in conducting a fair trial Democrats sat on the articles for nearly a month.  Where’s the urgency in that? At every step of this charade it’s been clear they are more interested in taking down the president than pursuing facts.

History will remember this impeachment process as a completely partisan weapon to take down President Trump.   After nearly a month of stalling in sending the articles to the Senate House Democrats still have no case against the president. https://t.co/bUGEmQhT9U
